ygData.subject: Re: New bard plate
ygData.msgSnippet: The new battle cry: Dead or alive, you re dancing with me Operaman ... From: Bard  To:  Sent: Tuesday, October 12,
ygData.messageBody:
The new battle cry:

"Dead or alive, you're dancing with me"

Operaman

----- Original Message -----
From: Bard <dabard@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, October 12, 1999 8:38 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] New bard plate


> From: "Bard" <dabard@...>
>
> Heh! I was telling a ranger friend of mine that once I got my armor, I
was to be known from then on as Robo-Smurf
>
> -=B=-
> -----Original Message-----
> From: jhenders@... <jhenders@...>
> To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Date: Tuesday, October 12, 1999 6:41 PM
> Subject: [eqbards] New bard plate
>
>

> >
> >It just occured to me that the new colour for our plate is particularly
> >appropriate. Now when we enter dungeons, we can announce "Attention
> >Monsters, your blue plate special for today will be...."
